description: There has a license management vulnerability in some Huawei products. An attacker with high privilege needs to perform specific operations to exploit the vulnerability on the affected device. Due to improper license management of the device, as a result, the license file can be applied and affect integrity of the device. Affected product versions include:S12700 V200R007C01,V200R007C01B102,V200R008C00,V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10;S1700 V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10;S2700 V200R008C00,V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10;S5700 V200R008C00,V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10,V200R011C10SPC100;S6700 V200R008C00,V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10,V200R011C10SPC100;S7700 V200R008C00,V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10;S9700 V200R007C01,V200R007C01B102,V200R008C00,V200R010C00SPC300,V200R011C00,V200R011C00SPC100,V200R011C10.
